greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Replace n with concatenation of its odd divisors.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: dtn[ L_ ] := Fold[ 10#1+#2&, 0, L ] Array[ dtn[ Flatten[ Map[ IntegerDigits, Select[ Divisors[ # ], OddQ ] ] ] ]&, 50 ]
program: a037283 = read . concat . (map show) . a182469_row :: Integer -> Integer
def a(n): return int("".join(str(d) for d in divisors(n) if d%2==1))
print([a(n) for n in range(1, 52)]) # _Michael S. Branicky_, Dec 31 2020
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
